name: Miniships 8x8
description:
I made this game while testing love2d. It's really unpolished (no fonts, no sounds, etc.). For this test I wanted to make a literally small "office game" that you can play without being caught by your boss. Of course I don't advice to do so... :)

Actually I didn't have much time for coding and doing graphics, so I decided to use a small screen size and small (8x8, hence the name) sprites.

You drive your spaceship trying to blast all the enemy ships without wasting a single shot and without letting any of them go past you. Your final score heavily depends on that!

Arrows = move
S = shoot
D = toggles debug mode on/off (it's just "internal information" for testing purposes)
